docs.text: Arduino-LG Welcome to Arduino-LG ! This website is dedicated to sharing Arduino code examples, tutorials, and tips for beginners and enthusiasts. Example: Blinking LED ```cpp // Blink an LED on pin 13 void setup() { pinMode(13, OUTPUT); } void loop() { digitalWrite(13, HIGH); // Turn LED on delay(1000); // Wait 1 second digitalWrite(13, LOW); // Turn LED off delay(1000); // Wait 1 second }
